modmenu.descriptionTranslation.moreculli: A mod that changes how multiple types of culling are handled in order to improve performance
moreculling.config.title: MoreCulling
moreculling.config.option.customItemFram: Enables the custom item frame renderer
moreculling.config.option.itemFrameLODRa: Change the distance that this culling starts to work at
moreculling.config.option.itemFrame3Face: Change the distance that this culling starts to work at, may be visible at smaller distances
Change the type of culling used for leaves. Higher is faster!
moreculling.config.option.leavesCullingD: Change how far leaves should check for Depth-based culling
